trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_00<tab>Krile is brimming with pride.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_01<tab>As you recount the more dramatic points of the ascension ceremony, Wuk Lamat comes to join you. A well-intentioned “Dawnservant” later, and she reminds you of how little she enjoys titles. You and your comrades are like unto family, she says, and as such, should call her “Lamaty'i.” Swept up in the happy moment, Wuk Lamat invites you to accompany her as she thanks her supporters gathered in the city.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_02<tab>First on the list of supporters to meet with are Wuk Evu and Mablu, who were spotted at Aunt Tii's Tacos. Wuk Lamat insists she has not prioritized them for purposes of acquiring celebratory snacks, but whether this proves true remains to be seen.
※You must be accompanied by Wuk Lamat to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_03<tab>You find Wuk Evu, Mablu, Tobli, and Linuhanu in good spirits and enjoying the finest tacos in Tuliyollal. Mablu and Tobli provide updates from Urqopacha from alpaca health to commemorative discounts, whilst Linuhanu reminds Wuk Lamat of her promise to attend Ihih'hana. Wuk Evu, predictably flustered by Wuk Lamat's new title, eventually settles down long enough to offer his services as a tutor regarding the cultures and customs of communities in Xak Tural.
※You must be accompanied by Wuk Lamat to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_04<tab>You come upon two Yok Huy, a Moblin, and an Elezen artisan in Bayside Bevy─an eclectic group of familiar faces. Wuk Lamat echoes the promises she made in her ascension speech to Gurfurlur and Zurmurwur regarding the Chirwagur, and while they predict change will take time, they are nevertheless optimistic. Meanwhile, Rakorok chats animatedly about cooperation and Fonjeantaine seems to have found inner peace.
※You must be accompanied by Wuk Lamat to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_05<tab>Hunmu Rruk, Zereel Ja, and Miilal Ja are gathered on the Gornitruq Gleamsands. The Xbr'aax Rax congratulates Wuk Lamat with all due formality, but there is no concealing the pride in his eyes. With an apologetic smile, Miilal Ja explains that Bakool Ja Ja left early, unready to face his new Dawnservant. Just as notably absent is Ketenramm, though it is noted that he has always been somewhat mercurial in his appearances.
Having spoken to everyone she could, Wuk Lamat suggests the two of you head back to the Winged Walk.
※You must be accompanied by Wuk Lamat to complete this task. Speak with her again should you become separated.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_06<tab>After a journey that spanned an ocean and half a continent, Wuk Lamat has defied the odds and become Dawnservant of Tuliyollal. She would have you remain by her side in an official capacity to help guide the nation into a brighter future─but adventurers are not wont to linger in a single place for long, and you have yet to explore the northern reaches of Tural...

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SEQ_07<tab>So it is that you bid farewell to your other traveling companions and join Erenville at the Xak Tural skygate. What adventures wait for you beyond, only time will tell.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Wuk Lamat and have her accompany you.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Wuk Evu while accompanied by Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Fonjeantaine while accompanied by Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TODO_03<tab>Speak with Hunmu Rruk while accompanied by Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TODO_04<tab>Speak with Krile while accompanied by Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TODO_05<tab>Speak with Erenville.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_001<tab>She might have told <var 1A 02 /var>someone<var 1A 01 /var> what she was planning...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_002<tab>But Wuk Lamat does not act without the best interests of her people in mind.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALPHINAUD_000_003<tab>The Head of Reason was very wise indeed to devise something so elaborate and meaningful as the rite of succession. 'Tis a shame he could not be here to bear witness to the end.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALISAIE_000_004<tab>A bittersweet celebration to be sure, but I'm glad Wuk Lamat finally got the recognition she deserves.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_005<tab>Wuk Lamat has truly come into her own, has she not?

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALPHINAUD_000_010<tab>Indeed. Even as she moved the people with her heartfelt words, she retained her characteristic spontaneity─as evidenced by her nomination of Koana as fellow Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_015<tab>As sudden as it was, I would like to believe she gave it all due consideration.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALISAIE_000_020<tab>She could do far worse. Koana completed every feat except the last, and that he only forfeited to help Wuk Lamat secure victory.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_025<tab>I look forward to seeing how Tuliyollal will prosper under their care.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_030<tab>Everyone, thank you for coming!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_035<tab>I could see you all perfectly from up there.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALISAIE_000_040<tab>That was an impressive speech, Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_045<tab>I told you─no titles!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_050<tab>Besides, after everything we've been through together, you're nothing less than family.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_055<tab>So...like my family does, I'd like you to call me Lamaty'i.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_A1_000_001<tab>It'd be my honor, Lamaty'i!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_A1_000_002<tab>I'll try to pronounce it correctly!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_065<tab>Thank you. It means a lot to me.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_070<tab>It would also be my honor to call you Lamaty'i.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_075<tab>Oh, don't worry about that. However you say it, I know it'll be with love.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_080<tab>If we do mispronounce it, please correct us, but...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_085<tab>It would be my honor to call you Lamaty'i.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_090<tab>Come on, say something would you? We already have Erenville for the mocking silences!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_095<tab>I think you've simply caught our friend off guard.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_100<tab>Personally, it would be my honor to call you Lamaty'i.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALISAIE_000_105<tab>Mine as well.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALPHINAUD_000_110<tab>Indeed. Consider us your Eorzean cousins, if such a notion appeals to you.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_115<tab>Eorzean cousins...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_120<tab>It's a little embarrassing...but not in a bad way!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_125<tab>There's still lots I'd like to say, but I need to make my rounds first.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_130<tab>I want to thank my supporters who're visiting for the occasion. Could you wait for me here?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_135<tab>Of course. We'll keep ourselves entertained.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_140<tab>That said, would you join me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_145<tab>Wonderful! Come and meet me outside the Winged Walk, then.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_160<tab>Don't worry about us! Go on and have fun with Wuk La─er, Lamaty'i!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_161<tab>She'll always be “Wuk Lamat” to me. No matter how important she gets.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALPHINAUD_000_162<tab>I don't believe I saw Ketenramm in attendance. Did you?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALISAIE_000_163<tab>La<var 1A 02 /var>ma<var 1A 01 /var>ty'i... Lama<var 1A 02 /var>ty'i<var 1A 01 /var>? Hmm...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_165<tab>Ready? Let's go.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_170<tab>Our first stop is Aunt Tii's Tacos─and not just for a snack, I promise. Wuk Evu and Mablu should be there.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SYSTEM_000_171<tab>Wuk Lamat is now accompanying you. Keep her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SYSTEM_000_172<tab>You can leave Wuk Lamat behind by entering a different area, or by speaking with her and selecting the option to part ways.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SYSTEM_000_173<tab>If you wish to have Wuk Lamat accompany you again, return and speak with her at the original location.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you do?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_A2_000_001<tab>Small talk.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_A2_000_002<tab>Part ways with Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_A2_000_003<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_190<tab>Of course, since we'll be at Aunt Tii's Tacos <var 1A 02 /var>anyway<var 1A 01 /var>, we might as well pick up some snacks as well, right?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SYSTEM_000_195<tab>Are you sure you wish to part ways with Wuk Lamat?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_200<tab>Did something come up? That's fine─meet me by the Winged Walk once you're finished!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_201<tab>Why if it isn't <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Marvelous ceremony, wasn't it?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SYSTEM_000_202<tab>You must be accompanied by Wuk Lamat and have her at your side in order to proceed with quest objectives.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SYSTEM_000_203<tab>Wuk Lamat has yet to arrive. Be sure she is at your side before attempting to continue.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_205<tab>Let's get going!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_210<tab>Dawnservant Wuk Lamat. Words cannot well express the profound joy your ascension has brought me.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_215<tab>No need for formalities. I'm still the same old me.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_220<tab>All right, then. I shall forgo formalities.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_225<tab>Argh, but I cannot! You are Dawnservant! Too disrespectful it is to address you without your due title!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_230<tab>As Dawnservant, I'm ordering you not to bother with formalities!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_235<tab>All right, then. I won't bother anymore.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TOBLI_000_240<tab>I could more easily converse with a drunken alpaca.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MABLU_000_245<tab>Thank you for helping Wuk Lamat become Dawnservant, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MABLU_000_250<tab>Political opinions in our community may have been divided, but a Dawnservant's ascension presents us all with a prime opportunity. Which is why I convinced everyone to participate in a commemorative sales campaign!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MABLU_000_255<tab>A wonderful plan, no? My first big undertaking as a merchant!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_LINUHANU_000_260<tab>I do like the sound of a sale! ...So long as I'm not persuaded to buy too much.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_265<tab>It's so good to see all of you again. I wanted to personally thank each of you for your help.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_270<tab>The Feat of Reeds and the Feat of Gold were my first true tests as a claimant. If not for your guidance, I would have failed the rite of succession before I fully understood its importance.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_275<tab>Now that you've given me a taste for celebrating culture, I can't wait to see what else Tuliyollal has to offer. In Xak Tural, for instance!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_280<tab>As always, you must observe proper etiquette. I would be happy to offer my services as a tutor, should you desire them.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_285<tab>I can think of no better instructor! I'll be sure to bring Koana as well.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_LINUHANU_000_290<tab>Your duties as Dawnservant will be plentiful─but don't forget your promise to attend Ihih'hana next season.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_295<tab>Of course! I wouldn't miss it.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MABLU_000_300<tab>When I've made a name for myself as a merchant, I'll come by the palace and tell you all about my biggest sales!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_305<tab>Hehe, I look forward to it!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_TOBLI_000_310<tab>I have been personally attending to your alpaca's care. Dare we hope to see you at the ranch again?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_315<tab>Hehe, tell my fluffy, spit-filled friend that Wuk Lamat will visit soon.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_320<tab>Anyway, you'll have to excuse us. Oh─you haven't seen Fonjeantaine around here, have you? A tall, slim fellow with long pointy ears.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_325<tab>I saw a man matching that description by the weapons dealer in Bayside Bevy. In the company of a Moblin and a pair of Yok Huy, if I remember correctly.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_330<tab>Bayside Bevy─got it!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_335<tab>Enjoy the festivities, everyone. And the tacos!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKEVU_000_350<tab>We could not have asked for a finer Dawnservant.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_360<tab>Sounds like Fonjeantaine has made new friends. Which should make him easy to find!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_FONJEANTAINE_000_361<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! A pleasure to see you again.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_FONJEANTAINE_000_365<tab>Wuk La─er, Dawnservant! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! You honor us with your presence!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_370<tab>Thank you for coming, everyone! I know the journey to Tuliyollal isn't a short one.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_RAKOROK_000_375<tab>Pfff... Pfffkohhh... Longroad worth the travel to congratulate new Dawnservants!

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_GURFURLUR_000_380<tab>To hear the Head of Reason has passed brings me sorrow, but we who remember him will ensure he lives on. May the accolades of this day be as offerings to the future he envisioned.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZURMURWUR_000_385<tab>The High Luminary and I attend on behalf of Worlar's Echo. Had our people come en masse, we would have been an obstruction.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_390<tab>Nonsense! You're always welcome─all of you! This is your city as much as anyone's!

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_FONJEANTAINE_000_395<tab>I'm glad to see you hale and whole, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. Though I know little of the particulars, I can only imagine your latest adventure has been both long and...colorful.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_FONJEANTAINE_000_400<tab>Beginning with near shipwreck, if you'll remember! Yet here we stand, celebrating the ascension of your claimant.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_405<tab>When my journey began, I thought only of preserving the peace that my father worked so hard to create.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_410<tab>But the Feat of Pots, the Feat of Proof, and the Feat of Ice showed me that peace is not simply the absence of war.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_415<tab>Being able to live together in safety and happiness─that was what my father envisioned for this nation. That's the Tuliyollal I want for you all.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_420<tab>So I promise you this─as Dawnservant, I will do everything I can to bring that same happiness to the bandits in Kozama'uka and the Yok Huy of Chirwagur Saltern. I won't forsake them.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_GURFURLUR_000_425<tab>As I was moved by your father's influence, so too may the Chirwagur come to accept your peace.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZURMURWUR_000_430<tab>Their beliefs have stood for a millennium. While not easily shifted, neither are they immutable.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_435<tab>Heh! Well, I can be pretty determined. They'll come around eventually, mark my words!

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_FONJEANTAINE_000_440<tab>I can vouch for the efficacy of such determination. Thanks to the Moblins' hospitality, I have been able to rediscover the joy of my craft and honor my father's legacy.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_RAKOROK_000_445<tab>Pfff... Kohhh... Now that goodliving is secure, the village overflows with feelsmiles! Such cooperation between helphands and potsworn is the very spirit of a healthy potpact.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_450<tab>A partnership like yours is bound to be fruitful. I look forward to seeing the fantastic pieces you produce!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_455<tab>There are some other people I'd like to see, so we should take our leave. Let's try and find Hunmu Rruk.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZURMURWUR_000_460<tab>The Xbr'aax Rax? I believe I saw him on the sands below.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_465<tab>The Gleamsands! Thank you.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_470<tab>Enjoy your time in the city! And remember─this will always be your home too.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_FONJEANTAINE_000_480<tab>Come and visit us in Earthenshire! Rakorok and I should be glad to welcome you.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_485<tab>Let's make for the Gleamsands. Hunmu Rruk should be there!

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_HUNMURRUK_000_486<tab>Glad am I to see you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I had hoped I might extend congratulations to the Dawnservant, but she no doubt has other duties to attend to...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_HUNMURRUK_000_490<tab>My, my. You honor us with a personal visit, Dawnservant. Congratulations upon your ascension.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_495<tab>No, no, none of that. My title may have changed, but I'm still just Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_HUNMURRUK_000_500<tab>More than “just,” I'd say. You have grown into a leader fit for this nation. Your father must be proud.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_505<tab>I hope so. But...big events like this make me wonder, you know? What my birth parents might say if they knew.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_HUNMURRUK_000_510<tab>...I imagine they would say that it fills their hearts with joy to see the strong, compassionate woman you have become.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_HUNMURRUK_000_515<tab>I owe you my thanks as well. For fulfilling your promise to me.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MIILALJA_000_520<tab>I told Bakool Ja Ja to stay with us so we could all congratulate you in person.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MIILALJA_000_525<tab>But he marched off, muttering something about not being able to face you just yet.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZEREELJA_000_530<tab>The boy needs purpose. Purpose beyond catering to the demands of others. He was always too obliging for his own good...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_535<tab>I'm sure he'll find it in his own time. Especially if he knows his family is there for him.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZEREELJA_000_540<tab>...That we are.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_545<tab>By the by, have you seen Ketenramm anywhere? Er, Tankwa, that is!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MIILALJA_000_550<tab>Ketenramm, was it? A strong name...if a bit exotic.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_MIILALJA_100_550<tab>We called upon him before leaving Mamook, but he wasn't at home. I don't recall seeing him at the ceremony either.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_HUNMURRUK_000_555<tab>The First Promise was notably absent as well. Though I assumed he required time to salve his injured pride.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_560<tab>Everyone thought he'd be the one to succeed Papa. My victory must have come as quite a shock to him.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_565<tab>As for Tankwa, I'm sure he's around here somewhere. Or ready to appear when we least expect him.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_570<tab>We'd best be going, but relax, enjoy, and make yourselves at home! And come and visit us any time!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_575<tab>All right, I think I found everyone I could find. Let's return to the others in the Winged Walk!

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_590<tab>There are rumors that Gulool Ja Ja may go on pilgrimage now that he's no longer Dawnservant. Though I'm sure the transition process will keep him in the capital for some time yet.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALPHINAUD_000_591<tab>Gulool Ja Ja stopped by to offer his thanks for our support.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALPHINAUD_000_592<tab>He also bade me extend his gratitude to you for assisting a concerned father? I'm not sure what he meant by it, but I assume you do.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ALISAIE_000_593<tab>Oh, you're back! Erenville was just regaling us with stories of Lamaty'i from when they were little.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_594<tab>What, the one about the taco? It was basically clean when I found it─or no, the one about Papa's feathers!? Look, I didn't know where else to wipe my nose, and I was too little to know better!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_HUNMURRUK_000_595<tab>Wuk Lamat may have realized her goal, but I hope you will continue to be a friend to her.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_WUKLAMAT_000_600<tab>Let's head back to the Winged Walk. Everyone's waiting!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_601<tab>Is Wuk Lamat still making her rounds?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_KRILE_000_605<tab>Welcome back. I hope you didn't rush on our account.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_620<tab>Past these gates and over the bridge lies Xak Tural.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_625<tab>You have your permit, yes? Packed and ready? No last-minute stops to make before we leave?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ERENVILLE_000_630<tab><sigh> Forgive me. I'm afraid traveling with our new Dawnservant may have scarred me for life...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SYSTEM_100_070<tab>Meanwhile, in the depths of the Skydeep Cenote...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZORAALJA_000_070<tab>This...is the gate to the golden city?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_071<tab>Two decades ago, your father bade me transcribe a letter to a scholar across the salt, petitioning the study of this place.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_072<tab>What he discovered was something the Dawnservant feared enough to seal away forever...or so we thought until the rite's objective became the city of gold.

TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_073<tab>But to think that Tankwa would be entrusted with its safekeeping! Had I known that doddering old fool carried a set of keystones, we might have spared ourselves those tiresome feats.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_074<tab>Great power sleeps here─and with it, you shall obtain your birthright.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZORAALJA_000_075<tab>So you say. Yet the new Dawnservants succeeded where I could not. Taking their throne will be no easy task.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_076<tab>The Resilient Son underestimates his own potential! There is no need for worry.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_077<tab>I have liberated the key from the Dawnservant's vault. You alone have the means to unlock the gate.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_078<tab>You will gain all you were denied. The rite, your father's shade─these bitter memories shall soon be forgotten.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_079<tab>Seize your future, Promise. Open the gate, and become the ruler you were destined to be!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_080<tab>I-It's working!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SPHENE_000_081<tab>(-???-)Is some...there? Can...hear me?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SPHENE_000_082<tab>(-???-)...At last!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_083<tab>Who's there!? Show yourself!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SPHENE_000_084<tab>(-???-)If only I could. Alas, this gate will not open for me. Only the key in your possession can connect us.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_085<tab>Then...you are the guardian of the city's great power?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SPHENE_000_086<tab>(-???-)I do not claim this power is great... But the knowledge I possess is enough to realize any desire. To remake worlds.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZORAALJA_000_087<tab>Is that so...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZORAALJA_000_088<tab>Hahaha... Ahahaha!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZORAALJA_000_089<tab>Fascinating. Name your price, then. For my desire is the world itself...
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_090<tab>Yes, yes! The Resilient Son rises! Together we shall create a nation worthy of our rule!
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SAREELJA_000_091<tab>P-Promise! Wh-Why?
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZORAALJA_000_092<tab>The useless tool is cast aside.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_ZORAALJA_000_093<tab>Deliver me a new world. One that bends to my will.
TEXT_KINGMC115_04911_SPHENE_000_094<tab>(-???-)As you wish. But in exchange...
